content.body: is the notation _record_.[[<_nameOfField_>]] OK to use in ECMA-262? it's used plenty in ECMA-402, but there are no examples of it in 262 as far as I can see
content.formatted_body: is the notation record.[[<nameOfField>]] OK to use in ECMA-262? it's used plenty in ECMA-402, but there are no examples of it in 262 as far as I can see

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: is the notation _record_.[[<_nameOfField_>]] OK to use in ECMA-262? it's used plenty in ECMA-402, but there are no examples of it in 262 as far as I can see
is the notation record.[[<nameOfField>]] OK to use in ECMA-262? it's used plenty in ECMA-402, but there are no examples of it in 262 as far as I can see

content.body: no, I just realized you meant it _with_ the brackets
content.formatted_body: no, I just realized you meant it with the brackets

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: no, I just realized you meant it _with_ the brackets
no, I just realized you meant it with the brackets

content.body: ecma262 does not use that notation currently, and we as editors would generally prefer to avoid it if at all possible
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: ecma262 does not use that notation currently, and we as editors would generally prefer to avoid it if at all possible

content.body: what's the context in which you need that?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: what's the context in which you need that?

content.body: "Set the field of _record_ whose name is _fieldName_ to _value_" seems like it could be better expressed, and indeed ECMA-402 consistently does "Set _record_.[[<_fieldName_>]] to _value_"
content.formatted_body: "Set the field of record whose name is fieldName to value" seems like it could be better expressed, and indeed ECMA-402 consistently does "Set record.[[<fieldName>]] to value"

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: "Set the field of _record_ whose name is _fieldName_ to _value_" seems like it could be better expressed, and indeed ECMA-402 consistently does "Set _record_.[[<_fieldName_>]] to _value_"
"Set the field of record whose name is fieldName to value" seems like it could be better expressed, and indeed ECMA-402 consistently does "Set record.[[<fieldName>]] to value"
